title: Mike Bithell's John Wick Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.08.19
description:
Get started for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get $30 off 23andMe’s Health + Ancestry Kit at http://23andme.com/games

Fran and Greg talk about Bithell Games' take on John Wick, EA's future, and The Division 2's up coming update.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:02 - Housekeeping
Congrats, Fran, on joining the Destiny Community Podcast as a permanent co-host!
Town Hall after 12:30 p.m. PT
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:38 - John Wick Game from Mike Bithell
00:12:20 - EA Financials
00:28:45 - Persona 5 Royal Deets, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:30:58 - Microsoft’s Braille Controller, RV @ GIB
00:34:34 - Let’s Get Nerdy About The Division 2
00:43:25 - BREAKING NEWS: U.S. Senator Introduces Bill To Ban Loot Boxes And Pay-To-Win Microtransactions
00:46:50 -  Hims
00:48:15 - 23&Me
00:49:15 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:51:30 - Is there any part of the gaming industry that you wish you guys knew more about like VR? Is there is a niche that you wish you had someone at Kinda Funny knew more about? - David Scott
00:53:40 - What are your thoughts on separating art from the artist and how to handle some of these complex topics on the thing we love? - Borzen00
00:58:37 - Squad Up: Abe(PC) - Zaxxon Gallaxian#2956
01:00:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Greg and Andrea
